sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Chip from '@material-ui/core/Chip'; import CodeRoundedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/CodeRounded'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import CardActionArea from '@material-ui/core/CardActionArea'; import CardMedia from '@material-ui/core/CardMedia'; import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import me from '../images/me.jpg'; import { Box,Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ bio:{ margin:'3rem auto', maxWidth:360 }, skillHeading:{ color:'whitesmoke', marginLeft:'2rem', opacity:0.8, fontSize: 48, fontWeight:500, fontFamily: "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif", borderBottom: 'white dotted', }, skills: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap', '& > *': { margin: theme.spacing(0.5), }, } })) function AboutMe(){ const classes = useStyles(); return( Ripudaman Kaushik I am a full-stack developer who loves to code. On a constant lookout for fresh ideas and new technologies to learn. My mantra "Eager to Start, Determined to Finish." Skills
} label="ReactJS" color="secondary" /> } label="Python" color="primary" /> } label="Javascript" color="secondary" /> } label="HTML5" color="primary" /> } label="CSS3" color="secondary" /> } label="Docker" color="primary" /> } label="C#/.NET" color="secondary" /> } label="OpenCV" color="primary" />
) } export default AboutMe
